meanings: (때·시기 등에 이르다) be, come, become; (나이가) reach, (formal) attain; (경과하다) pass
(동사적 명사에 붙어) become, get to be, be

vlive.korean: 실시간으로 듣게 되었다... while preparing to get to work in the morning... 듣기 View video BTS : 슙디의 꿀 FM 06.13 with J-HOPE #0613FM_0523
vlive.english: while preparing to get to work in the morning...

vlive.korean: [1억은 내게 와 백만이 되었다] 그런 기념으로 다시 할게요! [100 million came to me as 1 million] I'll say that again! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [손동표] 올림포스에 에로스가 있다면 지구엔 사랑둥이 동표가 있거든요💘 (Dongpyo singing number song)
vlive.english: [100 million came to me as 1 million] I'll say that again!

examples.korean: All our efforts have come to nought. 발음듣기 우리의 모든 노력이 허사가 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: All our efforts have come to nought. 발음

examples.korean: The ship was stranded on a sandbank. 발음듣기 그 배는 모래톱에 얹혀 꼼짝을 못하게 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The ship was stranded on a sandbank. 발음

examples.korean: She was fearful that she would fail. 발음듣기 그녀는 실패할까 봐 걱정이 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was fearful that she would fail. 발음

examples.korean: She was granted bail with a surety of $500. 발음듣기 그녀는 500 달러의 보석금을 내고 보석이 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was granted bail with a surety of $500. 발음

examples.korean: He became an object of universal derision. 발음듣기 그는 만인의 조롱거리가 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He became an object of universal derision. 발음
